description: This file defines the interface for the CCSP Message Bus Service, including function declarations, constants, and documentation for message bus interactions and signals.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the message bus interface.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_GetHealth
methods.description: Retrieves the health status of the message bus component.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with given priority and user data.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a parameter value change.

methods.name: CcspAdvSec_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles incoming DBus messages on a specific path.

methods.name: ssp_AdvsecMbi_WaitConditionReady
methods.description: Waits until a certain condition is ready on the message bus.
